rules_text:
As this creature enters, remove a counter from any number of permanents you control. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.
{3}, Remove a counter from this creature: Amass 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't have one, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)[/i]
